response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, I propose to offer it to you at a price of $1,350,000. This amount reflects the balance between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to ensure a fair transaction. I trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1350000}
